languages.text: "Для нас {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносы{/g} — скорее источник дохода, чем угроза..." {n}Владайм замирает, оценивая вашу реакцию.{/n}
"For us here, {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} are more of a source of income than a threat..." {n}Vladaym freezes, gauging your reaction.{/n}

languages.text: 「ここにいる私達にとって、{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}は脅威というより収入源だ…」{n}ヴラダイムはピタリと動きを止めて、こちらの反応を測っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "For us here, {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} are more of a source of income than a threat..." {n}Vladaym freezes, gauging your reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ここにいる私達にとって、{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}は脅威というより収入源だ…」{n}ヴラダイムはピタリと動きを止めて、こちらの反応を測っている。{/n}

languages.text: “对我们而言，{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}更像是用来盈利的资源，而非威胁……”{n}弗拉迪姆停了下来，观察你的反应。{/n}
languages.original_text: "For us here, {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} are more of a source of income than a threat..." {n}Vladaym freezes, gauging your reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “对我们而言，{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}更像是用来盈利的资源，而非威胁……”{n}弗拉迪姆停了下来，观察你的反应。{/n}

languages.text: «Para nosotros, los {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} suponen más una fuente de ingresos que una amenaza...». {n}Vladaym se queda inmóvil, midiendo tu reacción{/n}.
languages.original_text: "For us here, {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} are more of a source of income than a threat..." {n}Vladaym freezes, gauging your reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Para nosotros, los {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} suponen más una fuente de ingresos que una amenaza...». {n}Vladaym se queda inmóvil, midiendo tu reacción{/n}.

languages.text: « Pour nous, les {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} sont plus une source de revenus qu'une menace... » {n}Vladaym s'interrompt, attendant votre réaction.{/n}
languages.original_text: "For us here, {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} are more of a source of income than a threat..." {n}Vladaym freezes, gauging your reaction.{/n}

languages.text: "Für uns hier sind {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} eher eine Einnahmequelle als eine Bedrohung ..." {n}Vladaym erstarrt und prüft deine Reaktion.{/n}
languages.original_text: "For us here, {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} are more of a source of income than a threat..." {n}Vladaym freezes, gauging your reaction.{/n}

languages.text: "Bizim için {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zenolar{/g}, tehditten ziyade bir gelir kaynağı." {n}Vladaym duraksayıp senden gelecek tepkiyi bekliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "For us here, {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} are more of a source of income than a threat..." {n}Vladaym freezes, gauging your reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Biz {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zenolar{/g}ı tehdit olarak görmekten çok gelir kaynağı olarak kullanıyoruz." {n}Vladaym ne tepki vereceğini bekleyerek duruyor.{/n}
